DOC.brief_title: Zanamivir Aqueous Solution Compassionate Use Program Retrospective Chart Review Study
DOC.detailed_description: This observational , retrospective , multi-centre , cohort data collection study . The CUP retrospective review study design collect safety clinical outcome data pediatric pregnant patient ( collectively refer `` Tier 1 '' cohort ) treat globally within CUP 2009/2010 pandemic ( May 2009 ) 31 January 2011 . The study also attempt collect data adult patient ( refer `` Tier 2 '' cohort ) treat site identify Tier 1 patient . The treat physician site receive letter GSK medical director invite him/her participate retrospective chart review study . Physicians ( delegate ) agree participate receive study-related documentation [ include protocol case report form ( CRF ) ] orient site study detail CRF . For purpose study , term `` site '' generally refer hospital in-patient treatment provide . The retrospective chart review monitor via remote visit telephone . The interviewer Kendle associate assign study direct access patient 's source document medical record conduct study . The physician/delegate review patient 's chart record data paper CRF . The CRF English language . Site personnel mail complete CRFs Kendle . Kendle review CRF data quality , conduct remote monitoring visit via telephone address data query , require . No visit participate site plan .
